song_lyrics: He... Goḷ goḷ goḷ chage rāsno hiloḷ,
Ūḍe ūḍe ūḍe āj ānandnī chhoḷ;
Thaī thaī thaī Shrījī nāche thanak thaī,
Ame bāḷuḍā ghumīe gaī gaī gaī...
He vāge ḍhamm ḍhamm ḍhol, thāy ānand killol;
Gāye gavḍāve ne tāḷī de hāthamā
Rumak jhumak rās rame Swāmī aṇmol... 1
Ramī ramī rās thayā haiyā tarboḷ... 2
title: He vāge ḍhamm ḍhamm ḍhol thāy ānand killol

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-230: Sadhu Priyadarshandas

Category: Bal Kirtan
